hudson.tasks.Shell.command: #!/bin/bash -xe # Replace content in Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV QUOTING=false|ENV QUOTING=${EnableQuoting}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV CACHE_TTL=30|ENV CACHE_TTL=${CacheTTL}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV MAX_CPU=|ENV MAX_CPU=${MaxCPU}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV APM_SECRET_TOKEN=|ENV APM_SECRET_TOKEN=${APMToken}|g" Dockerfile sed -i 's|ENV PRODUCER_STREAM=|ENV PRODUCER_STREAM=CRSP|g' Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV LOGSTASH_LEVEL='info'|ENV LOGSTASH_LEVEL=${LogLevel}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV APM_ACTIVE=true|ENV APM_ACTIVE=${APMActive}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV SERVER_URL=0.0.0.0:4222|ENV SERVER_URL=${NATS_SERVER_URL}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV STARTUP_TYPE=nats|ENV STARTUP_TYPE=${NATS_SERVER_TYPE}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV REDIS_SERVERS=|ENV REDIS_SERVERS=${RedisServers} |g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV REDIS_AUTH=|ENV REDIS_AUTH=${RedisPassword}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV REDIS_IS_CLUSTER=|ENV REDIS_IS_CLUSTER=${RedisCluster}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV PSEUDONYMS_DATABASE_URL=|ENV PSEUDONYMS_DATABASE_URL=${ArangoPseudonymsURL}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV PSEUDONYMS_DATABASE_PASSWORD=|ENV PSEUDONYMS_DATABASE_PASSWORD=${ArangoPseudonymsPassword}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV PSEUDONYMS_DATABASE_CERT_PATH=|ENV PSEUDONYMS_DATABASE_CERT_PATH='/usr/local/share/ca-certificates/ca-certificates.crt'|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV TRANSACTION_HISTORY_DATABASE_URL=|ENV TRANSACTION_HISTORY_DATABASE_URL=${ArangoTransactionHistoryURL}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|ENV TRANSACTION_HISTORY_DATABASE_PASSWORD=|ENV TRANSACTION_HISTORY_DATABASE_PASSWORD=${ArangoTransactionHistoryPassword}|g" Dockerfile sed -i "s|example.io|${ImageRepository}|g" deployment.yaml sed -i "s|${ImageRepository}/transaction-monitoring-service-rel-1-0-0|${ImageRepository}/transaction-monitoring-service-rel-1-0-0-${envName}|g" deployment.yaml sed -i "s/\${GH_TOKEN}/${READ_GH_TOKEN}/g" .npmrc ls -l # Login to container registry echo $REG_PASS | buildah login --username $REG_USER --password-stdin ${ImageRepository} # Build Docker Image buildah bud --format docker --ulimit nofile=4096:4096 -t ${ImageRepository}/transaction-monitoring-service-rel-1-0-0-${envName}:1.0.0 . # Push Docker Image to Container Registry buildah push ${ImageRepository}/transaction-monitoring-service-rel-1-0-0-${envName}:1.0.0 # Apply newly built image to a kubernetes pod kubectl apply -f deployment.yaml # Rollout restart the deployment to take effect kubectl rollout restart deployment transaction-monitoring-service-rel-1-0-0 -n processor # Apply the service configuration kubectl apply -f service.yaml
